title: Time Converter
subtitle: Convert between milliseconds, seconds, minutes, hours, and days.

usage.description: Tracking time in clocks, timers, and schedules.

usage.title: Science:
usage.description: Milliseconds and seconds are used in experiments and physics.

funFacts.title: Leap Seconds:
funFacts.description: Occasionally added to keep clocks in sync with Earth's rotation.

funFacts.title: Fastest Second:
funFacts.description: Atomic clocks measure time to an accuracy of one second in 300 million years!
